ygData.subject: RE: Post awhile back on Crafted Locations
ygData.msgSnippet: The circlet does come off another named Necro other than Drelzna.  He/she is on the ramps by the lava in the back of the area with Bonecrusher and the Ogre
ygData.messageBody:
The circlet does come off another named Necro other than Drelzna. He/she is
on the ramps by the lava in the back of the area with Bonecrusher and the
Ogre Captain. There is a DE magician on the first landing and this necro is
on the next. There are a couple elementals in the lava too, so depending on
your level, you could have quite a handful. I think the named mob is mid
twenties, not sure tho, been awhile since I fought it.

> ----------
> From: dlobdell[SMTP:dlobdell@...]
> Reply To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Sent: Thursday, September 02, 1999 1:19 AM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Post awhile back on Crafted Locations
>
> From: "dlobdell" <dlobdell@...>
>
> Are these absolutly confirmed? Cause i was told the circlet required for
> the greaves was found on a necro in najena named "Tarzon" Or Tazran"
> something of that natrue.. not Drelzna who ive fought many times and never
> recieved the circlet..
>
> Wes Lobdell,
> Note: I'm not a Mac person, but you have to admit, the following is

> it for all its worth yet after all...
> Quote: "Macintosh -- we might not get everything right, but
> atleast we knew the century was going to end."
>

> My all time favorite Oxymorons:
> exact estimate, plastic silverware, genuine imitation, mud bath,
> original copy, student teacher, alone together, anarchy rules, bitter
> sweet, bankrupt millionaire, black light, butt-head, casual sex, clean
> dirt, coed sorority, cold as hell, computer jock, constant change,
> cowardly lion, curved line(according to the mathematical definition of a

> a ways ;), educational television, even odds, found missing, freezer burn,

> angels, idiot savant, jumbo shrimp, less is more, and finally my all time
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jason Harrell <jharrell@...>
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> Date: Wednesday, September 01, 1999 4:55 PM
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Post awhile back on Crafted Locations
>
>
> >From: "Jason Harrell" <jharrell@...>
> >
> >Here's the repost =)
> >
> >1. See below, otherwise hail the named cents and follow the prompts.
> >2. No, anyone can do the quest.
> >3. The Star Rubies, Fire Emeralds, Rubies, and Sapphires can be bought in
> a
> >number of places that sell the jewelling metals (Qeynos and Freeport
> >verified). The other components are dropped items.
> >4. WAR only items, all races though. Check sites like EQ'Lizer for the
> >actual stats on them.
> >
> >Gauntlets: Aviak Charm (Aviak Avocets, South Karana), and 2 Star Rubies
> >Boots: Frost Totem (Ice Goblin High Shamans, Permafrost), 2 Star Rubies
> >Helm: Fire Totem (Fire Goblin High Clerics, Solusek), 2 Rubies
> >Vambrace: Eye of a Griffon (East Commonlands, North Karana, etc.), 2 Fire
> >Emeralds
> >Bracer: Evil Eye Optic Nerve (rare drop item like the Polished Bone
> Bracer),
> >a Sapphire
> >Greaves: Silver Circlet (Necromancer in Najena, Drelzna), 2 Star Rubies
> >Pauldrones: the Three Parts of the Rune of Dwarves (Evil Eyes, Runnyeye),
> >Fire Emerald
> >Breastplate: Werewolf Talons (Mistmoore, Mayong Tribe), 3 Rubies
> >
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: Whitcraft,David [mailto:DWHITCRAFT@...]
> >Sent: Wednesday, September 01, 1999 3:52 PM
> >To: 'EQ-Spoilers@onelist.com'; 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
> >Subject: [EQCheats] Post awhile back on Crafted Locations

> on

> >it to me?
> >
> >If not, can we fill the list back out again?
